thread.section_title: Firmoo Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Firmoo | www.firmoo.com
thread.title: Cherise

author: Cherise
title: Cherise
text: I wasn't satisfied with my initial order because the two pairs of glasses that I had chosen did not suit me (that's the downside of ordering anything remotely; it's often hit or miss. Although...I was also a little ambitious). Subsequently, I emailed Firmoo Support to return the one I deemed the worst, and exchange the other for the same frame in a different color. After getting in contact with Lynn and having a few days to contemplate because of their factory's Spring Festival holiday, I ended up exchanging both pairs for two completely different ones at no extra charge- which is so amazing of them because my lenses actually need to be custom-made. I am very grateful for Lynn and Firmoo's excellent service, and will definitely purchase my future glasses through them again.
